author: e01
title: A Lazy Summers Day at the Beach
review:
I'll make this quick, as there isn't much interesting about it, a good figure with nice torso shirt. The sandcastle isn't much, but the umbrella and cool folding-chair design is a score.

Pros

  • Good figure
  • Comes w/umbrella, beach chair, little flag, bucket, crab (so nice parts)
  • Cheap price

Cons

  • Not much playability
  • Sandcastle does not look like a sandcastle
  • Other parts are mainly boring
So overall, not big of a deal, but if you live by the beach, this would be a nice little set to have for its excellent price.
